channel.title: Need 24/7 hoster plz or need help with getting the server up for people to use!
channel.description:
plz me and my mate (coder) really need a hoster because when i host
ive done the portforawding and no-ip.com thing but still dosent work so we really need a hoster u can be co-owner if u can!!
or if u carnt could u plz help me why no one can get on the server thx lukeyboi27

item.title: Need 24/7 hoster plz or need help with getting the server up for people to use!
item.dc:creator: @derive derive
item.description:
@derive wrote:

Dont ask for sombody else to host your server its a very great feeling to host a server
just to see if its your portfowarding you’ve done wrong go onto your client and write 0.0.0.0 and login if it works you have to try port fowarding diffrent…

Read full topic
item.source: Need 24/7 hoster plz or need help with getting the server up for people to use!
